verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse:
We come alive to magnify the praises of our God
The rocks cry out if we don't shout the praises of our God
There's nothing that Can stand against the praises of our God
We will defeat the enemy with the praises of our God

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Oh sing praise to our God for his name is worthy, worthy
Oh sing praise to our God for our God is worthy, worthy

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge: 2x
His praise in us is glori-ous
Shout it out make it loud make it louder
No other one is like our God
Lifted High Lift Him up Lift Him Higher
